Python Module for Finite Rate of Innovation (FRI) sampling 1.0.0 documentation
previous | next | modules | index

Simulation API¶

class simulation.Simulation(K, tau, L)¶

abstract class defining a reconstruction simulation

__init__(K, tau, L)¶
Parameters:
K: int

number of needed diracs to reconstruct

tau: float

period

L: int

number of samples
add_noise(P, noiseless, complex=False)¶

Method for addition of noise to signal

Parameters:
P: float

SNR ratio in db

noiseless: ndarray

signal without noise

complex: bool

True if needs a imaginary noise addition, for Fourier domain samples
Returns:
withNoise: ndarray

the signal with noise

noise_level: float

the noise_level
plot()¶

abstract plotting method

reconstruction()¶

abstract method for reconstruction

save_results(simName)¶

save the results to the results file

Parameters:
simName: str

string naming the file
setup()¶

abstract method for setup the reconstruction

show_results()¶

shows the results fof the reconstructed data
